title: Azure Service Fabric Official Repositories
body:
Official Azure Service Fabric GitHub repositories collection:

**Main Repository:**
- Service Fabric (Main): https://github.com/Microsoft/service-fabric
  - Core runtime, source code, release notes (moved from Azure org)

**SDK and Libraries:**
- Services and Actors (.NET): https://github.com/Azure/service-fabric-services-and-actors-dotnet
- ASP.NET Core Integration: https://github.com/Azure/service-fabric-aspnetcore

**Tools:**
- Service Fabric CLI: https://github.com/Azure/service-fabric-cli
- Service Fabric Explorer: https://github.com/microsoft/service-fabric-explorer

**Yeoman Generators:**
- Java Generator: https://github.com/Azure/generator-azuresfjava
- C# Generator: https://github.com/Azure/generator-azuresfcsharp
- Guest Executables: https://github.com/Azure/generator-azuresfguest
- Container Generator: https://github.com/Azure/generator-azuresfcontainer

**Additional Resources:**
- Templates and TSG repositories may be available in Azure/Microsoft organizations

These repositories contain the complete Service Fabric ecosystem for building microservices on Azure and on-premises.
semanticSummary: Official Azure Service Fabric GitHub repositories collection:
